txt.en:
'These plans you gathered, [placeholder], are deeply disturbing to me. While I believe the encampments we have here in Moria to be strong enough to withstand any assault, Mekhem-bizru in the Dimrill Dale is new and weak...it has not yet been fortified. It would be a disaster if this plan of Mazog's is not averted.

'Inform Alrekur at Mekhem-bizru in the Dimrill Dale of the impending attack. To get there, head east, through Nud-melek, past what remains of the Bridge of Khazad-dûm and out the First Hall.

'Make haste, [placeholder]. We cannot afford to lose our foothold in the Dale.'

'Geirfast is a good dwarf, but he is too much of a worrier. Not that his worries are unfounded, mind you.\n\n'We have seen the Orcs moving about for several days now. Something is definitely going on. I do not yet know what, but it surely does not bring us good tidings.'
'You should warn Alrekur at Mekhem-bizru at once of the Orcs' imminent attack!'
The plans revealed that Mazog is moving to destroy Mekhem-bizru in the Dimrill Dale and then move against Lothlórien.

Alrekur is at Mekhem-bizru in the Dimrill Dale, far to the east of the Twenty-first Hall and past the gates of the First Hall.\n\nGeirfast asked you to head to Mekhem-bizru in the Dimrill Dale and inform Alrekur that Mazog is planning to attack the small outpost.
